text: The material in IRM section 4.22.12 is obsolete because the study referenced is complete, and NRP is not conducting examination of C Corporation returns. If needed, prior guidance information can be found in the IRS repository. Go to http://oldirm.web.irs.gov/ for more information.
IRM 4.22.12, dated 07-30-2012 is obsolete as of the date of this transmittal.
LB&I revenue agents, group/team managers and territory managers assigned NRP returns.
